thread.section_title: CarRental8 Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of CarRental8 | carrental8.com | 8 of 86
thread.title: Karen

author: Karen
title: Karen
text:
This was my first time using CarRental8.com and I gotta say, they were A-W-E-S-O-M-E!!
I used to rent from Advantage/EZ, but it is absolutely impossible to reach a customer service rep via the phone. After waiting on hold for sometimes 30-45 minutes, you get an overseas call center and they do not have a clue how to help you.
With CarRental8, not only do they have a stateside call center, they answered the phone in less than 5 minutes AND you get a courteous customer service rep who is knowledgeable and can actually help!!! What a novel concept! Their rates are competitive and they represent on site car rental companies so you pay the same amount, but don't have to travel off campus on a shuttle to pick up your car. Awesome!!! Will be using them from now on.
